name: Chronicles 1 Miraculous Dimension
description:
Prologue

One walking on unknown Forest some reasons starting hear some voice saying i going to get you kiwi max  Fufufu, after that stop start hearing voice, saw small Village, after few min getting in Village, ghosts appear in towns, ghosts Attack everybody and possession, every ghost stop and looked it me and ran, One Village tell me stop Incident and so the Adventure begins to solving this mystery voice and this Incident.

Features:

*RPG Turn Based Mix with Bullet hell!

*Music Room

*Art Gallery

*Extra Chronicles (A.K.A) Extra Stage

*Mid Game References

*All Original Music Compose by widen612
